system.description:
Also at 1st level, your mystical powers manifest in very tangible skills. Choose one benefit from the following:

Warrior’s Gift

You are proficient with martial weapons and heavy armor.

Nature’s Insight

You gain proficiency with your choice of either Insight or Nature. You also learn two bonus cantrips, which count as cleric spells for you and do not count against your number of known cantrips. Those cantrips are @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ljixftygfhi0sfsf]{Guidance}, plus one other cantrip based on your archetype spell list:

  • Fire Priest. Any one fire cantrip from any spell list.

  • Ice Priest. Any one cold cantrip from any spell list.

  • Plant Priest. Either @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.zaeerhaj7ici4dtd]{Shillelagh}, or any one plants or poison cantrip from any spell list.

  • Stone Priest. Any one earth or force cantrip from any spell list. 

  • Storm Priest. Any one lighting, thunder, or storm cantrip from any spell list. 

  • Water Priest. Any one acid or water cantrip from any spell list.
